definition: guilty and deserves to be punished (idiom); entirely appropriate chastisement/the punishment fits the crime
variant of 罪[zui4], crime
guilt/crime/fault/blame/sin
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
surname Ying
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: And you're thinking - at last, they get their comeuppance.
sentences.chinese: 你或许在想，他们总算是罪有应得了。

sentences.english: Those criminals deserve to be locked up in jail.
sentences.chinese: 这些罪犯被关到坚牢是罪有应得。

sentences.english: But opponents believe that Mikhail Khodorkovsky embezzled a large number of state-owned assets, deserved.
sentences.chinese: 但反对者认为，霍氏侵吞大量国有资产，罪有应得。

sentences.english: or, they are saying: " you deserved it".
sentences.chinese: 还有人会说，你罪有应得。

definition: death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
to have only oneself to blame (idiom)/to bring trouble through one's own actions
guilty of terrible crimes (idiom)/reprehensible
to reap what one has sown (idiom)/to stew in one's own juice
lit. strung through and filled with evil (idiom); filled with extreme evil/replete with vice/guilty of monstrous crimes
retribution/judgment
wicked beyond redemption (idiom)/heinous
appropriate retribution (idiom)
evil has its retribution (idiom); to suffer the consequences of one's bad deeds/sow the wind and reap the whirlwind (Hosea 8:7)
evil crimes fill heaven (idiom)
lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
to accuse wrongly/to treat unjustly/injustice/wronged/not worthwhile
persisting in evil brings about self-destruction (idiom)
pinyin: duo1 xing2 bu4 yi4 bi4 zi4 bi4

definition: lit. to eat one's own bitter fruit (idiom)/fig. to suffer the consequences of one's own actions/to stew in one's own juice
to entrap/to frame/to plant false evidence against sb
to commit suicide to escape punishment
